project_descr: Support to Economic Planning - The overall aim of the project is to provide institutional support to the Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning and the Southern Sudan Commission for Census, Statistics and Evaluation (SSCCSE).

outputs.output_descr:
The overall aim of the project is to provide institutional support to the Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning (MoFEP) and the Southern Sudan Centre for Census, Statistics and Evaluation (SSCCSE) to: 
•Enhance the capacity of the Government of Southern Sudan's Budget Sector Working Groups (BSWGs) for planning, budgeting & reporting 
•Support MoFEP in leading the development of a GoSS Development Framework based on the outputs of the GoSS Budget Sector Plans.
•Support MoFEP so that Donor & UN projects are increasingly formulated, co-ordinated and reported on in line with the Government of Southern Sudan's development priorities and economic development needs.
•Support the SSCCSE to improve its capacity to produce, use and monitor socio-economic statistics and measure progress towards the MDGs
